speechBalloon.h2: The best choice for your smile, proven by experience.

reviewSlider.h4: Check out the reviews everyone is satisfied with at Hyukplant.

reviews.message: This was the best dentist I have ever visited! I needed an implant treatment and from start to finish, they explained everything so kindly and the treatment was painless, I was moved. I had a lot of fear about going to the dentist, but now I have no more worries. This is a truly trustworthy dentist. I plan to visit again next time. Thank you!

I had to visit a dentist urgently and chose this one based on its many good reviews on Naver. I was worried I made a mistake when I saw they had a review event, but after receiving the consultation and treatment, I felt like I made the right choice. They guided me through the treatment process so I could relax and be comfortable. From the head doctor to all the BarunChoice medical staff, everyone was kind and beautiful~^^

This dentist shows no weaknesses. Having weak teeth, I've visited various dentists, and most of them only talked about their specialties. This dentist, without overtreating, thoroughly checked and explained everything. The dentist spent so much time with me that I wondered if it was too much, which made me trust them. The nurses also played a big role in creating such an atmosphere. They were very kind and detailed in their guidance. I'm planning to settle here for regular check-ups.

I looked around a lot for implant treatment, but no place was as satisfactory as here. The professional explanation and careful treatment process were impressive. I'm very satisfied with the results of the treatment, and I'm so thankful that the whole process was painless. Thanks to the kindness and professionalism of the staff, I plan to use this service regularly. Highly recommended!

It was my first time receiving implant treatment, and thanks to the delicate touch and professional consultation of this dentist, I could receive treatment without much worry. They explained the treatment process in detail, so I could understand exactly what procedures were being carried out. Also, they thoroughly guided me on post-treatment care. I'm truly thankful and plan to keep using this service.

I visited this dentist on a friend's recommendation and it exceeded my expectations. Especially, the consultation based on their deep knowledge and experience with implants was impressive. The treatment process was more comfortable than I thought, and the results were very satisfying. The effort of all staff members to make patients comfortable was noticeable and appreciated, and the hygiene condition was very clean. I've decided to go here next time without a doubt!

cosmeticDentistry.textFill: Up to 5 hours of treatment time. Long-lasting with just one session. Fast and effective. Hyukplant whitening

proSection.proSection_h4: Have You Seen Whitening Like This?

customizedTreatment.spanBox1: Whiteners certified by the FDA and KFDA

spans: To satisfy each and every patient,
We provide the most suitable whitening solution.

categoryText.h2: Everything you need is right here.
categoryText.p1: Professional whitening is a premium whitening service conducted at dental clinics, utilizing the latest technologies such as the Zoom2 Whitening System and the BEAUTIS One-Day Whitening System. The Zoom2 system uses a high-concentration whitening agent and a professional laser to effectively remove discoloration from teeth, allowing for a noticeably brighter smile in just one visit. The BEAUTIS system activates the whitening gel using visible light, offering quick and excellent whitening results while minimizing gum irritation and sensitivity. These professional whitening methods are ideal for modern individuals who desire quick results without the constraints of time.
categoryText.p2: At-home whitening is a convenient whitening method that can be performed at home, provided through the Opalescence At-Home Whitening Kit. This kit includes trays custom-made to fit the individual's teeth and a high-viscosity whitening gel that can be applied directly by the user. The Opalescence whitening gel does not easily drip from the tray, minimizing irritation to the teeth and gums and reducing sensitivity. The whitening effects of at-home whitening typically become apparent after a week, and continued use can gradually make the teeth brighter. At-home whitening is an efficient choice in terms of time and cost, recommended for those who wish to maintain the whitening effect after professional whitening.

section1.h2: Experience dazzling changes in just one day.
section1.span3: it's the perfect choice for everyone.
